alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 16 at 9:05PM CDT until June 19 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Alabama... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From Monday morning to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:05 PM CDT Friday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.0 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
